episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg shares actionable strategies for using video to generate real estate leads. She emphasizes the importance of building credibility and connection through a mix of personal and professional content. Kim also provides insights into balancing iPhone and professional video content, and how consistent posting can keep agents top-of-mind with their audience.
